name: UpdateInterviewSchedule
description:
Update, add, or cancel interview schedule events.

This tool allows updating, adding, or canceling events in an interview schedule. It should be called to manage interview schedules effectively. Requires 'interviewsWrite' permission and the event's 'interviewEventId' to proceed with updates.

parameters.name: interview_schedule_request
parameters.description: JSON object specifying the interview schedule update details, including `interviewScheduleId`, event details, cancellation IDs, and feedback deletion flag.

interviewEvent.description:
An event on the interview schedule to create or update.
To update an event, the event's `interviewEventId` must be included in the request.

interviewEventIdToCancel.description: The ids of interview events to cancel.

allowFeedbackDeletion.description: By default, we do not allow interview events with submitted feedback to be canceled because canceling an event causes its associated feedback to be deleted. If you want to allow events with submitted feedback to be canceled, this flag can be passed in and set to `true`. In this case, events with feedback will be canceled, and any associated feedback will be deleted.
